post.description: Allows members to add a new event to their calendar.

201.description: Event successfully added to the calendar.

401.description: Unauthorized. Only members can add events.

delete.description: Deletes a specific calendar event along with all associated time entries. Requires user authentication.

parameters.name: calendarId

calendarId.description: The unique identifier of the calendar event to delete.

parameters.description: A JSON object containing the calendarId of the event to be deleted.

400.description: Invalid request. Please provide a valid calendarId.

401.description: Unauthorized. Only authenticated members can delete events.

404.description: Not Found. The calendar event does not exist or the calendarId is incorrect.

500.description: Internal server error. Could not delete the event due to a server error.

patch.description: Updates an existing event and its associated times in the calendar. Requires user authentication and that the caller is the owner of the event.

parameters.name: body

calendarId.description: The unique identifier of the calendar event to update.

isreptition.description: Flag indicating if the event repeats ('T' or 'F').

scheduleTimes.description: List of new times for the event, in 'YYYY-MM-DD HH:MM:SS HH:MM:SS' format.

reptitioncycle.description: How often the event repeats, in weeks (0 if it does not repeat).

iscontinuous.description: Flag indicating if the event repeats continuously ('T' or 'F').

reptition_time.description: Number of times the event should repeat.

end_date.description: End date for the event (if it repeats).

parameters.description: A JSON object containing details about the event to be updated.

400.description: Invalid request. Please ensure all required fields are filled correctly.

401.description: Unauthorized. Only authenticated users can update events.

404.description: Not found. No event found with the provided ID, or you do not own the event.

500.description: Internal server error. Could not update the event due to a server error.

get.summary: Get schedule information for a specific month
get.description: Retrieve the list of scheduled events for the given month. If an event is repeated, only instances falling within the specified month are returned.

parameters.name: month
parameters.description: The month for which the schedule is being queried in the format YYYY-MM.

200.description: A list of scheduled events for the specified month.

400.description: Bad request. A month query parameter is required.

401.description: Unauthorized. Only authenticated users can access their schedule.

500.description: Internal server error when fetching schedule information.

get.summary: Get schedule detail for a specific id
get.description: Retrieve the detail of scheduled events for the given month.

200.description: A detail of scheduled events for the specified id.

400.description: Bad request. A month query parameter is required.

401.description: Unauthorized. Only authenticated users can access their schedule.

500.description: Internal server error when fetching schedule information.

post.description: Allows members to confirm promises if they have the necessary permission, and store relevant details in the database.

400.description: Bad Request - errors like 'promise already confirmed', 'wrong weekday string', 'date out of range', 'wrong time id', 'wrong time range'

message.example: This promise has already been confirmed.

403.description: Forbidden - when the user does not have the necessary permissions to confirm the promise

message.example: you do not have permission to confirm this promise as member.

500.description: Internal Server Error - when an unexpected condition was encountered

message.example: An error occurred while confirming the promise.

patch.description: This endpoint allows authorized members or non-members to update details of an already confirmed promise, including the confirmed place and notice.

parameters.name: body
parameters.description: Data for updating an existing confirmation

promiseId.description: The ID of the promise to be updated

notice.description: New notice details of the promise

weekAvailable.description: List of weekdays available for week-based promises

dateAvailable.description: List of dates available for date-based promises

weekTimeAvailable.description: List of weekdays and time slots available

dateTimeAvailable.description: List of dates and time slots available

403.description: Forbidden - insufficient permissions to update confirmation

get.description: Fetches promise name, place, notice, and time information based on the promise type for confirmed promises, accessible only by members.

parameters.name: promiseid
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the promise

promiseName.description: The custom name of the promise given by the member

weekConfirmed.description: Weekdays confirmed for weekly promises without specific times

dateConfirmed.description: Specific dates confirmed for daily promises without specific times

weekTimeConfirmed.description: Weekdays with specific times confirmed for weekly promises

dateTimeConfirmed.description: Specific dates and times confirmed for daily promises

post.description: This endpoint allows members to copy promise details directly into their calendar. It handles various configurations of promises including those based on date or weekday. Members can set repetition rules if the promise configuration allows.

promiseid.description: The ID of the promise to copy.

color.description: Color code for the calendar event.

notice.description: Additional notes or notices for the event.

isreptition.description: Flag to indicate if the event should repeat.

scheduleTimes.description: List of times and dates for the event.

reptitioncycle.description: How often the event repeats in weeks.

iscontinuous.description: Flag to indicate if the event repeats indefinitely.

reptition_time.description: Number of times the event should repeat.

start_date.description: Start date for the schedule, used for week-based schedules.

end_date.description: End date for the repeating event.

201.description: Success - The promise details have been successfully copied to the calendar.

400.description: Bad Request - Invalid input or bad request parameters.

403.description: Forbidden - Access is denied due to invalid permissions.

500.description: Internal Server Error - Unable to process the request due to server error.

delete.description: Allows authorized members or nonmembers to cancel a confirmation of a promise. Access is restricted based on confirmation permissions.

promiseid.description: The ID of the promise to cancel confirmation for.

200.description: Success - The confirmation of the promise has been successfully canceled.

400.description: Bad Request - The request is malformed or missing necessary information.

403.description: Forbidden - The user does not have permission to cancel the confirmation.

404.description: Not Found - No member found associated with this promise.

500.description: Internal Server Error - An error occurred while processing the request.
